faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services

questions.question: What types of photography services do you offer?
questions.answer: We offer aerial drone photography, ground photography, event and wedding photography, commercial and real estate photography, plus editing and post-production services.

questions.question: How long does it take to deliver photos and videos?
questions.answer: We typically deliver edited photos within 3-5 business days and videos within 7-10 business days. For urgent cases, we can provide express delivery within 24-48 hours for an additional fee.

questions.question: Do you cover all regions of Saudi Arabia?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide our services throughout Saudi Arabia. We have specialized teams in major cities and can travel to any region based on project requirements.

questions.question: What are the costs of photography services?
questions.answer: Costs vary based on service type, shooting duration, and location. We offer various packages starting from 500 SAR for basic photography up to 5000 SAR for large projects. Book a free consultation for a customized quote.

questions.question: Do you need permits for aerial photography?
questions.answer: Yes, we are licensed by the Saudi General Authority of Civil Aviation and have all necessary permits for aerial photography. We handle all legal procedures and obtain required permits for each project.

questions.question: Can I get the raw unedited photos?
questions.answer: Yes, you can request raw photos for an additional fee. We typically provide edited photos as part of our basic service, but we can provide raw files if you need them for special purposes.

questions.question: What equipment do you use for aerial photography?
questions.answer: We use professional-grade drones including DJI Mavic 3 Pro, DJI Air 2S, and specialized equipment for different shooting conditions. All our equipment is regularly maintained and updated.

questions.question: Do you offer video editing and post-production services?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide comprehensive video editing services including color correction, audio enhancement, motion graphics, and professional post-production to deliver high-quality final products.

testimonials.title: Client Success Stories
testimonials.subtitle: Detailed testimonials from our satisfied customers

testimonials.name: Mohammed Al-Otaibi
testimonials.testimonial: I worked with Skyshot team for our new real estate project photography, and the results were amazing. The aerial photos showed the project very professionally and helped us a lot in marketing. The team is professional and cooperative, and delivery was on time.

testimonials.name: Sarah Al-Ahmad
testimonials.testimonial: The best photography team I've worked with! They photographed my daughter's wedding beautifully, the aerial shots added a magical touch to the event. The team was polite and professional, and the final result exceeded all my expectations. I highly recommend them for any important occasion.
